headline.print_headline: Apology for Jokes at the Oscars Riles Asian Academy Members
headline.main: Academy Chief’s Apology for Jokes at Oscars Riles Asian Members

snippet: “The obliviousness was actually shocking,” said the actor George Takei about the emailed apology from Dawn Hudson, head of the motion picture academy.
abstract: Around two dozen Asian members of Academy of Motion Picture Arts and Sciences call on academy's chief executive Dawn Hudson to apologize for jokes made by Oscars ceremony host Chris Rock and presenter Sacha Baron Cohen that they deem offensive to Asians; Hudson's reply is criticized by members for resembling form letter.
